text: The teachers are kind, nurturing and engaging. My child has shown great improvement in his year end exams. He enjoys the home cooked food and learning journey during the holidays! It is spacious and my child is happy going there. I'm glad we chose this student care.

Both my children are enrolled in the student care here and they enjoy attending the classes. They have reliable and dedicated staff and well-structured curriculum. I find their programme to be a comprehensive solution for parents and their children. It is also convenient as it's very close to the school.
My elder child is graduating this year and has done well for his PSLE! Very appreciative of the teachers there. Thank you!
